text: Self-Portrait, 1775, in the Tretyakov Gallery Pyotr Drozhdin (1745–1805) was a Russian painter. He studied in St. Petersburg under Alexei Antropov and Dmitri Levitsky, and was granted the title of Academician in 1785. ==References== * Category:18th-century Russian painters Category:Russian male painters Category:19th-century Russian painters Category:1745 births Category:1805 deaths
